Steps for a new project

> mkdir new-project-directory > cd new-project-directory > npm init -y - uses defaults - creates package.json, take a look and modify what you want > mkdir src > create src/index.js - put some javascript in there, such as console.log("In index.js");

Run it (notice how we are staying in the project home, not cd'ing into src)

> node src/index.js

Now make this runnable by package.json. Add the "start" options to the existing scripts:

{
  ...
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node src/index.js",
    ...
  },
  ...
}

Then run this with:

> npm start
